alert.note: Alert for Platte (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued April 15 at 12:37AM CDT by NWS Kansas City
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of Wyandotte, Leavenworth, northern Johnson, southeastern Atchison and Platte Counties through 115 AM CDT... At 1237 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over McLouth, or near Oskaloosa, moving east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Overland Park, Olathe, Shawnee, Lenexa, Leavenworth, Leawood, Prairie Village, Lansing, Merriam, Mission, Bonner Springs, De Soto, Parkville, Tonganoxie, Platte City, Basehor, Edwardsville, Fairway, Mission Hills and Riverside. This includes the following highways... Interstate 70 in Missouri near mile marker 0. Interstate 70 in Kansas between mile markers 410 and 423. Interstate 35 in Kansas between mile markers 223 and 234. Interstate 29 between mile markers 4 and 28. Interstate 635 between mile markers 0 and 12. Interstate 435 between mile markers 1 and 38. Kansas Turnpike between mile markers 206 and 226. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
